variables.name: connectedDevices
ConnectedDevicesSchema
Device
deviceGroup
variables.defaultValue: ['usb', 'connected'] as const

variables.name: DeviceGroup
deviceGroupSelector
variables.defaultValue:
(deviceGroup: DeviceGroup) =>
  createSelector(selectDevices, (devices) =>
    deviceGroup === 'usb' ? devices.usb : devices.connected
  )

variables.name: deviceNames
variables.defaultValue:
[
  'MouseBasiliskV3',
  'MouseViperV2Pro',
  'MouseRazerCobraPro',
  'CameraKyo',
  'KeyboardBlackWidow',
  'KeyboardHuntsmanV3Pro',
] as const

variables.name: DeviceRepository
variables.defaultValue: z.record(z.record(UsbDeviceRepositorySchema))

variables.name: DevicesLoadedFailure
variables.defaultValue:
createAction(
  'Devices failed to load',
  props<{ error: Error }>()
)

variables.name: DevicesLoadedSuccess
variables.defaultValue:
createAction(
  'Devices loaded successfully',
  props<{ devices: Device[] }>()
)

variables.name: devicesReducer
extractUsbDevice
variables.defaultValue:
<
  T extends Record<string, Record<string, Partial<Device>>>,
  G extends string & ExtractGroupKeys<T>,
  D extends string & ExtractIdKeys<T, G>
>(
  devices: T,
  deviceGroup: keyof T,
  deviceId: D
): Device => {
  const groupExists = !!devices[deviceGroup];
  if (!groupExists) {
    throw new Error(`Unkown device group ${String(deviceGroup)}`);
  }
  const deviceIdExists = !!devices[deviceGroup][deviceId];
  if (!deviceIdExists) {
    throw new Error(
      `Unknown device id ${String(deviceId)} in device group ${String(
        deviceGroup
      )}`
    );
  }

  const device = devices[deviceGroup][deviceId];
  return {
    __type: 'device',
    group: 'usb',

    id: deviceId,

    name: device.name,
    kind: device.kind,
    visual: device.visual,
  } as Device;
}

getDevices

apps/synapse-copycat/src/app/services/de.name: extractUsbDevice
apps/synapse-copycat/src/app/services/de.defaultValue:
<
  T extends Record<string, Record<string, Partial<Device>>>,
  G extends string & ExtractGroupKeys<T>,
  D extends string & ExtractIdKeys<T, G>
>(
  devices: T,
  deviceGroup: keyof T,
  deviceId: D
): Device => {
  const groupExists = !!devices[deviceGroup];
  if (!groupExists) {
    throw new Error(`Unkown device group ${String(deviceGroup)}`);
  }
  const deviceIdExists = !!devices[deviceGroup][deviceId];
  if (!deviceIdExists) {
    throw new Error(
      `Unknown device id ${String(deviceId)} in device group ${String(
        deviceGroup
      )}`
    );
  }

  const device = devices[deviceGroup][deviceId];
  return {
    __type: 'device',
    group: 'usb',

    id: deviceId,

    name: device.name,
    kind: device.kind,
    visual: device.visual,
  } as Device;
}
